resources.string: This functionality is not supported on your device.
Cross-platform mobile messaging with friends all over the world
You have a 3rd party task killer installed. Task killers can cause problems with WhatsApp Messenger and are unsupported by our customer service team.
You have a custom ROM installed. Custom ROMs can cause problems with WhatsApp Messenger and are unsupported by our customer service team.

"There are three problems with 3rd party task killers.
First, on Android 2.1, a task killer can PERMANENTLY kill WhatsApp. This causes you to LOSE messages that you would have otherwise expected to receive.
Second, on all Android versions, task killers can temporarily kill WhatsApp. This causes needless disconnects and reconnects to our server which DRAIN THE BATTERY of your device.
Third, on all Android versions, if the task killer closes WhatsApp, the WhatsApp server has no way of knowing that the connection has been closed. This means that message delivery will be impacted. Rest assured the message will be delivered but it could be DELAYED BY SEVERAL MINUTES as a result.
For these reasons, we recommend that you delete your 3rd party task killer.
Specifically, WhatsApp checks for:
Advanced Task Killer by ReChild Advanced Task Manager by Cyrket / Arron TasKiller by Cyrket / Arron Task Manager by Adao
In Android 2.1 and later versions, the need for a task killer is greatly diminished. If you really want to take the risk, we STRONGLY recommend that you add WhatsApp to the ignore list of your task killer. Please also understand that task killers are not supported by WhatsApp and that you use them at your own risk."

Custom ROMs have been known to cause problems with keyboard input methods, cloud to device (C2DM) notifications as well as timely and accurate message delivery. Further, many custom ROMs are bundled with task killing properties that cause the same problems as a 3rd party task killer. Please understand that custom ROMs are not supported by WhatsApp and that you use them at your own risk.
Note: tablets are currently not supported.

WhatsApp Messenger is available for Android, Nokia, BlackBerry, iPhone and Windows Phone.
WhatsApp Messenger: Android + iPhone + Nokia + BlackBerry + Windows Phone

"Hey,
I just downloaded WhatsApp Messenger on my Android.
It is a smartphone messenger which replaces SMS. This app even lets me send pictures, video and other multimedia!
WhatsApp Messenger is available for Android, iPhone, Nokia, Windows Phone and BlackBerry and there is no PIN or username to remember - it works just like SMS and uses your internet data plan.
Get it now from http://www.whatsapp.com/download/ and say good-bye to SMS!"
Check out WhatsApp Messenger for Android, iPhone, Nokia, BlackBerry and Windows Phone. Download it today from http://whatsapp.com/dl/

"If some of your friends don't appear in the contacts list, we recommend the following steps:"
"Make sure that your friend's phone number is in your address book"
Make sure that your friend is using WhatsApp Messenger
In your Android address book, make sure that all contact accounts (e.g. SIM, Google, Phone) are “visible” or “viewable”
In your Android address book, make sure that all contact groups (e.g. Friends, Family) are “visible” or “viewable”
We recommend that you make your contacts “not visible” and then “visible” to force a refresh. After doing this, launch WhatsApp > menu button > New > menu button > Refresh.
Tap “Show invisible contacts” to see which contacts are invisible.
Unable to look for your invisible contacts. Please try again later. If this problem persists, reboot your phone and try again.
Use all contacts, not just visible ones.

Delete you from all of your WhatsApp groups
Erase your message history on this phone
